did.abstract: The Kelsey Museum of Archaeology publications collection includes unit and sub-unit publications, as well as exhibit and promotional brochures, flyers, and press releases.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: Publications are received periodically from the unit (Donor # 6687).

accessrestrict.p: The publications are open for research.

userestrict.p: Copyright is held by the Regents of the University of Michigan.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, Kelsey Museum of Archaeology, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: Please consult the history found in the manuscript finding aid that precedes the publications finding aid.

scopecontent.p: The Kelsey Museum Publications series (.5 linear foot) consists of two subseries: Unit Publications and Sub-Unit Publications. Publications produced by the Kelsey Museum publications include exhibit catalogs, posters flyers and other publicity material, and newsletters.

The Unit Publications subseries includes an undated bibliography entitled The Kelsey Museum of Archaeology Publications. It also contains exhibit and promotional brochures, calendars, flyers, invitations, and press releases. The bulk of publications are exhibition catalogs. They describe exhibits covering a period from 1976 to 1990 with the majority of material from 1976 to 1983. Some of these catalogs have a few black and white photographs, but most have no illustrations. There is also a proposal, dated 1986, presenting the program statement of the Kelsey Museum of Archaeology with a description of the proposed renovation and addition to Newberry Hall where the collection is housed. The Bulletin--Museums of Art and Archaeology which was published jointly by the University of Michigan Museum of Art and the Kelsey Museum of Archaeology from 1978 through 1988 will be found in the: University of Michigan. Museum of Art. Publications.

scopecontent.p: The Sub-Unit Publications subseries includes promotional brochures published by the Associates of the Museum. This organization serves as the Kelsey Museum of Archaeology friends group. They also produced the newsletters Associates Newsletter, issued from 1989 to 1993, and Kelsey Museum Newsletter, printed from 1994 to the present.
